item.title: âœ… Last week's post
item.description:
Insanity is the exact repetition of the same action, over and over again, in the hope of a change.

Monday

On Monday, I took distance classes, then rested.

Tuesday

I didn’t have classes at the institute on Tuesday, so Tuesday was like a day off for me.

Wednesday

I also had no classes at the institute on Wednesday, so I started doing an external course.

Thursday

Thursday was a day off, which I spent doing an external course.

Friday

On Friday, I played a volleyball tournament in our Fok, the tournament was in honor of Victory Day, and my team won first place with me.

Saturday

On Saturday, I continued to do the external course and rested.

Sunday

On Sunday, I finalized the external course by completing the last section.
